definition: A journey that encompasses traveling to various destinations across the globe, typically involving visits to multiple countries and continents. It is commonly used to describe a long-term trip or expedition undertaken by individuals seeking to explore different cultures, experience diverse landscapes, and gain a comprehensive understanding of the world.

examples.english: I am planning a world trip.

examples.german: Sie hat eine Weltreise um die Erde gemacht.
examples.english: She took a world trip around the globe.

examples.german: Eine Weltreise kann eine lebensverändernde Erfahrung sein.
examples.english: A world trip can be a life-changing experience.

examples.german: Er hat seine Weltreise dokumentiert und ein Buch darüber geschrieben.
examples.english: He documented his world trip and wrote a book about it.

examples.german: Die Weltreise dauerte ein ganzes Jahr.
examples.english: The world trip lasted for a whole year.
